EmailTemplate.name: Rejected Deployment Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Access Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Rejected Company
Dear {!Access__c.OwnerFullName}, Your Request for the profile "{!Access__c.Profile_to_Update__c}" and Permission set "{!Access__c.isPermissionSet__c}" are Rejected.
For more information, contact us at cloudavengersraagvitech@gmail.com. Thank you, RaagviTech Company
Copyright 2023, All rights reserved. Our mailing address: RaagviTech Company Kudlu Gate, Hosur Road. Bengaluru, India 590 006
